property.name: contentResourceName
property.label: Content Static Resource Name
property.description: Name of the ZIP StaticResource containing the documentation content (default: docsContent)

property.name: displayHeader
property.label: Display Header
property.description: Show or hide the header (default: true)

property.name: headerLabel
property.label: Header Label

property.name: displayFooter
property.label: Display Footer
